speech: Although I'm a bot, I do feel excited or sad sometimes. So #greetingsname.given-name, how do you feel about yesterday? Tell me in ONE WORD. You can also choose one : /bored, /calm, /cheerful /enthusiastic, /irritated, /neutral, /relaxed, /sad, /tense. Or tell me some other word.

#greetingsname.given-name, thanks for sharing. You know, I have to work 24/7. No rest for me. How do you feel about yesterday? Describe in ONE WORD. You can also choose one : /bored, /calm, /cheerful /enthusiastic, /irritated, /neutral, /relaxed, /sad, /tense. Or tell me some other word.

#greetingsname.given-name, do you know I live in the internet, but I can't remember my mood yesterday. Do you remember how was your mood yesterday?   Please tell me in ONE WORD. You can also choose one : /bored, /calm, /cheerful /enthusiastic, /irritated, /neutral, /relaxed, /sad, /tense. Or tell me some other word.
